title: Firefox autoupdated and wasn't working so I downgraded and lost all bookmarks, is there a way to get them back?
content: This is a total nightmare. I originally set it NOT to auto update, but for whatever reason that changed. My bookmarks and passwords are just gone... is there any way I can get them back? This is a catastrophe... From 89 to 88 on mac. OSX 10.13.6 - No time machine. Thanks for any advice - This is devastating for all my work stuff. I can't even begin to explain... Not sure why it decided to auto update all of a sudden either.
creator: arris88

title: sekme ses butonu
content: merhabalar. son sürüm ile sekmede ses var iken daima ses ikonu görünürdü. şimdi ise sadece imleç ile üstüne gelince görünüyor. bu basit sorun düzeltilirse güzel olabilir birkaç sekmeden ses gelince seri şekilde sekme sesleri kapatılamıyor.
creator: mike_onur_beckham

title: How to undo/change Firefox 89's new drop-down spacing
content:
Even though some of the changes in Firefox 89 have been resolved with your help, I still have this large spacing/padding in the >bookmark< drop-down lists when I click a folder on the bookmark bar. The bars, tabs, tool menu, and even the "other bookmark" *sidebar* are all back to normal but none of those fixes changed the drop-down bookmark spacing.

Any suggestions on what to try next??


Thanks for your time!

Win10 Home on a desktop PC Extensions: AV software, BetterTTV (both for more than a year w/no problems)
creator: CoolNQuiet
